error.api_looks_like_site: API key looks like a site ID
error.limit_not_number: API limit is not a number
error.limit_one_or_greater: API limit must be one or greater
error.limit_too_many: There are more API limit counts entered than keys

data.api_quota: API limit (optionally comma separate multiple values for each key)

reconfigure_confirm.description:
Solcast Account Details

(If not using auto-update then an automation is required - see the integration documentation)

data.api_quota: API limit (optionally comma separate multiple values for each key)

user.description:
Solcast Account Details

(If not using auto-update then an automation is required - see the integration documentation)

actuals_not_enabled.message: Estimated actuals acquisition is not enabled.

auto_use_force.message: Auto-update is enabled, ignoring service event for forecast update, use Force Update instead.

auto_use_normal.message: Auto-update is not enabled, ignoring service event for force forecast update, use Update instead.

damp_auto_enabled.message: Automated dampening is enabled, not setting manual dampening factors.

damp_count_not_correct.message: There are not 24 or 48 comma separated numbers between 0.0 and 1.0.

damp_error_parsing.message: Error parsing dampening factor comma separated numbers.

damp_no_all_24.message: Specifying a site of 'all' is not allowed with 24 factors, remove site from the request.

damp_no_factors.message: No dampening factors, must be a comma separated list of numbers between 0.0 and 1.0.

damp_not_for_site.message: Site dampening is not set for {site}.

damp_outside_range.message: Dampening factor value present that is not between 0.0 and 1.0.

damp_use_all.message: Site dampening is not set for {site}, 'all' is the only available site parameter for the service call.

hard_not_positive_number.message: Hard limit value is not a positive number.

hard_too_many.message: More hard limits are specified than there are API keys.

init_cannot_get_sites.message: Sites data could not be retrieved.

init_cannot_get_sites_cache_invalid.message: Sites data could not be retrieved and cache is invalid.

init_no_sites.message: No sites found for API key.

init_usage_corrupt.message: Usage data is corrupt, check or delete `config/solcast-usage.json`.

integration_not_loaded.message: Integration not loaded, not performing action.

records_missing.description: Future forecast data is missing, which is unexpected because auto-update is enabled.
records_missing.title: Future forecasts missing

offer_auto.description: A forecast update automation has not been running. Would you like to enable auto-update? (Learn more: {learn_more})
offer_auto.title: Future forecasts missing

unusual_azimuth_northern.description: The azimuth for site {site} is unusual for the latitude of this northern hemisphere rooftop. Should this be {proposal} instead of {extant}? (Ignore the issue if the site is facing towards North.)
unusual_azimuth_northern.title: Unusual azimuth

unusual_azimuth_southern.description: The azimuth for site {site} is unusual for the latitude of this southern hemisphere rooftop. Should this be {proposal} instead of {extant}? (Ignore the issue if the site is facing towards South.)
unusual_azimuth_southern.title: Unusual azimuth

error.actuals_not_enabled: Estimated actuals acquisition is not enabled
error.actuals_without_get: Estimated actuals cannot be used without getting them
error.api_looks_like_site: API key looks like a site ID
error.dampen_without_actuals: Estimated actuals must be selected to use auto-dampening
error.dampen_without_generation: At least one PV generation Wh/kWh/MWh sensor must be specified to use auto-dampening
error.export_multiple_entities: Site export entity must be a single entity, not multiple entities
error.export_no_entity: Site export entity must be specified if site export limit is set
error.hard_not_number: Hard limit is not a positive number
error.hard_too_many: There are more hard limits entered than keys
error.limit_not_number: API limit is not a number
error.limit_one_or_greater: API limit must be one or greater
error.limit_too_many: There are more API limit counts entered than keys

data.api_quota: API limit (optionally comma separate multiple values for each key)
data.attr_brk_detailed: Enable site breakdown for half-hourly/hourly detail attributes (these will not be saved to database state attributes)
data.auto_dampen: Auto-dampen (requires estimated actuals and PV generation entity, see integration documentation)
data.auto_update: Auto-update (if no auto-update then an automation must be used instead)
data.config_damp: Modify the hourly dampening factors (after clicking submit)
data.customhoursensor: Custom next X hours sensor (min=1, max=144)
data.exclude_sites: Site(s) to exclude from the Energy dashboard and sensor totals
data.generation_entities: PV generation entity/entities for automated dampening (Wh/kWh/MWh, total increasing)
data.get_actuals: Estimated actuals updated at midnight (see integration documentation, uses one API call per site per day, so a reduced API limit is needed with this option enabled)
data.hard_limit_api: Inverter hard limit in kW (see integration documentation, comma separate multiple values for each key)
data.key_estimate: Preferred forecast likelihood to use for sensors
data.site_damp: Granular dampening is set: Clear to revert to overall hourly dampening
data.site_export_entity: Optional site export entity for automated dampening (Wh/kWh/MWh, total increasing)
data.site_export_limit: Site export limit if site export is specified (kW)
data.use_actuals: Forecast history to show on the Energy dashboard

options.1: Automatic update of forecasts from sunrise to sunset
options.2: Automatic update of forecasts over 24 hours

options.estimate10: 10th percentile expected generation (lower end of possible outcomes, estimate10)
options.estimate90: 90th percentile expected generation (upper end of possible outcomes, estimate90)

clear_all_solcast_data.description: Deletes the solcast.json file to remove all current solcast site data.
clear_all_solcast_data.name: Clear all saved Solcast data

force_update_estimates.description: Force fetches the latest estimated actual data from Solcast.
force_update_estimates.name: Force Update Estimated Actuals

force_update_forecasts.description: Force fetches the latest forecasts data from Solcast.
force_update_forecasts.name: Force Update

site.description: Optional site to get dampening. (Note: Will not work if granular dampening is not enabled.)
site.name: Site ID

query_estimate_data.description: Return a data set for a given query.

end_date_time.description: Query estimated actual data events up to date time.
end_date_time.name: End date time

start_date_time.description: Query estimated actual data events from date time.
start_date_time.name: Start date time

query_estimate_data.name: Query estimated actual data

query_forecast_data.description: Return a data set for a given query.

end_date_time.description: Query forecast data events up to date time.
end_date_time.name: End date time

site.description: Optional site to retrieve one site forecast
site.name: Site ID

start_date_time.description: Query forecast data events from date time.
start_date_time.name: Start date time

undampened.description: Optional boolean to retrieve un-dampened forecast
undampened.name: Undampened

query_forecast_data.name: Query forecast data

damp_factor.description: String of dampening factor values comma separated (24 or 48 values).
damp_factor.name: Dampening string

site.description: Optional site to set per-site dampening. (Note: Omitting site clears per-site dampening unless 48 values.)
site.name: Site ID

set_hard_limit.description: Prevent forecast values being higher than the inverter can produce.

hard_limit.description: Set the max value in Watts that the inverter can produce.
hard_limit.name: Limit value in Watts

set_hard_limit.name: Set inverter forecast hard limit

update_forecasts.description: Fetches the latest forecasts data from Solcast.
update_forecasts.name: Update
